name: Mulesoft Developer
description:
About Leadex Systems

At Leadex Systems our team is our greatest value and priority. We established a culture of mutual respect, constant development, and a constructive approach to problem-solving. We believe that a strong team is made of strong individuals who are committed to people’s growth and teamwork. We hire people who are hungry for knowledge and create a safe and challenging environment for them so that they can excel at what they love.

Position Summary

Do you enjoy working with cutting-edge technology to solve tough problems? Our teams at Leadex Systems are comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who guide clients through their most complex technology challenges. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to work with clients through critical issues, consider at Leadex Systems. Our core strength lies in a technical domain which is, combined with strong expertise and reputation in Digital Banking, FinTech and E-Commerce areas.

We are currently looking for an integration engineer to strengthen our team. Mulesoft experience is preferred but not required.

As a MuleSoft Developer, you will

  • Work with the Project Manager, architects, clients, and other stakeholders involved to implement MuleSoft APIs required by the business
  • Perform a technical analysis of business requirements;
  • Create RAML Specifications as API contracts for development;
  • Design and implement Dataweave scripts;
  • Practice API-Led Connectivity;
  • Implement Policies in API Manager;
  • Deploy APIs to Cloudhub, Runtime Fabric, On-prem workers, etc.;
  • Development process automation improvement including CI/CD pipeline;
  • Provide L3 support to the customer;
  • Mentor and train the internal team on design and architecture best practices.

Responsibilities

  • Design and implementation of integration applications based on MuleSoft Anypoint Platform;
  • Business requirements refinement and clarifications;
  • Development process automation improvement including CI/CD pipeline;
  • Perform optimization and enhancements of the solution to help our customers scale their solutions.

Skills and Qualifications

  • Minimum 2 years of experience with Mulesoft;
  • Minimum 2 years of experience and knowledge in MuleSoft's Anypoint Studio and Anypoint Platform such as Design Center, Runtime Manager, API Manager, Exchange, etc.;
  • Minimum 2 years of experience and understanding business requirements, working with stakeholders, and implementing complex integrations;
  • 2+ years demonstrated expertise designing, implementing, and supporting Enterprise-grade technical solutions meeting complex business requirements;
  • Strong knowledge of Enterprise Integration Patterns and API design best practices (both REST and RPC approaches);
  • Good understanding of the Microservices architectural style and its benefits/drawbacks against the traditional SOA approach;
  • Solid writing and speaking English communication skills (B2);
  • Experience working in a geographically distributed team using Agile frameworks and practices;
  • Experience with Linux container technologies (Docker/rkt) and their orchestration platforms; (Kubernetes/Openshift) is a preference.

Considered as Advantage

  • Certified Mulesoft developer;
  • 3 years of OOP development/design work experience;
  • Experience profiling and troubleshooting Java application code;
  • Experience working in a geographically distributed team using Agile frameworks and practices;
  • Experience with Linux container technologies (Docker/rkt) and their orchestration platforms (Kubernetes/Openshift) is a preference;
  • Experience with SSO/IDM - KeyCloak / ForgeRock / Okta / Auth0;
  • Broad experience with messaging systems (RabbitMQ, Apache ActiveMQ, Apache Kafka, ZeroMQ);
  • Advanced user experience with Linux or other Unix-like operating systems;
  • Experience in DevOps activities & automation (Jenkins, Teamcity, Bamboo), monitoring (Zabbix, Prometheus), cloud solutions (AWS, Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud).

We Offer

  • An exciting project with on-the-edge technology in one of the most dynamic industries;
  • A community of professionals to work and have fun together;
  • Flexibility in terms of location to work from: we consider applicants from all locations;
  • Relocation to Cyprus for Non-EU citizens is a possibility;
  • Competitive compensation and personal development plans to do more and to earn more.
